title: How to Find the Right Co-Founder
description: Most founders overlook this one thing when trying to find a partner who will make their business a success. In this special episode of Startup Theory, Tom chats with RLTY CHK Founder and former CMO of Quest Nutrition Nick Robinson about how he launched his new virtual reality gaming company. Topics include: * The Beginning of Quest Nutrition's social media. * Why VR is the future of content consumption. * How to find the right Co-founder. * Ways to hack focus and determination. * Should Impact Theory interviews be optimized for VR? * How to find your "why" when founding a company * Growing a product within the health and nutrition sector. * and much more!
